CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
2021  to present EOH – Digital Industries  
Position : Senior Technical Consultant – Processes  
Based on ITIL, he is  the senior consultant responsible for processes and to ensure standards service 
delivery to the major contracts withing EOH -DI’s services support portfolio. This role encompasses 
forming and implementing standards and procedures while also still assisting on large projects to 
ensure customer success and successful im plementation of gov ernance within the service delivery 
space. A significant portion of my time is allocated towards the standardization of disaster recovery and 
technical recovery plans all while ensuring the delivery of a standard and uniform approach to our 
customers in th e MES space of Digital industries. A requirement of this role is to provide mentorship to 
engineers and provide training to support teams consisting of all seniority levels. This forms part of the 
continuous improvement mindset for custo mer engagement and service continuity. Additionally to 
Processes, he also support s the consulting of technology in which we focus on “Best -Fit” and how to 
address any gaps in the realization of roadmaps and lifecycle management.  
 
2020 – 2021 EOH – Digital Industries  
Position: Technical Operations Manager for SASOL CCII  
This role entails managing the largest services support contract of the Digital Industries – MES LOB 
and the primary focus was on service delivery within SLA for 3 departments; Specialized S ystems 
(Infrastructure support), Data -Layer (MES and automation ap plication support) and Domain & Access 
(managing all the domain controllers and user / application access for the entire SASOL facility). During 
this role he had 3 teams report to me consist ing of a total of 16 engineers and an administrator. Based 
on ITIL,  the service delivery of this contract called for extensive standards implementation and 
governance compliance with very in -depth reporting on incidents / requests / operations support. Oth er 
functions that formed part of my operations within this role was  the OKR, KPA and Personal 
 development plans with career direction and development of all my reporting staff. Building of 
application and integration roadmaps was crucial in this role as it  was one of the majo r monthly 
reporting concentrations of the customer. Customer satisfaction management and quality assurance 
program implementation also formed part of my role.  
 
2018 – 2020 MEMCO  
 
2019 – 2020  
Position: Automation & IT Department Lead  
My role is to lead the engineers in the department from a project implementation and support 
perspective as well as to manage day -to-day requirements. In this role, he was required to develop 
presentations to customers mainly focusing on support and continue d support following project 
implementation. A primary focus in this role was to standardize pr ocedures, specifications and ensure 
operational governance as well as collaborate with existing customers following service 
implementations for roadmap developmen ts. This role came into existence after the success of 
establishing a footprint for MEMCO amon g the local customers in Oman. He had a multi -focus on 
business development a s well during this role to ensure pipeline for continued service delivery.  
 
2018 – 2019 
Position : Lead Automation MES Consultant  
My role is to lead the requirement definition, system design, implementation and hand -over of MES 
projects. In addition, he perform ed business development to grow the MEMCO market footprint in the 
information sys tems market. He led the implementation team for IS projects as well as performing local 
resource development . 
• Delivering technology presentation s to customers based on operational enhancement 
opportunities  
• Leading

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
